import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../styles/StarRating.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StarRating=_ref=>{let{onRatingChange,rating:initialRating=0,readOnly=false}=_ref;const[rating,setRating]=useState(Number(initialRating));// 숫자로 변환하여 설정

setRating(Number(initialRating));// 초기 별점 숫자로 변환
},[initialRating]);const handleRating=value=>{if(readOnly)return;// 읽기 전용이면 클릭 불가
setRating(value);// rating 업데이트

,onMouseEnter:()=>!readOnly&&setHover(value)// hover 상태 업데이트
,onMouseLeave:()=>!readOnly&&setHover(null)// hover 상태 초기화

,children:"\u2605"},index);})});};export default StarRating;
